Articles.Content:
Hello,

yesterday, while trying a low altitude flyby over Mun (about 3km) I saw a strange tinkle, but crashed while trying to lose enough delta-v. Today I saw it again. Maybe it\'s no big deal and everybody knows about it, but i\'d like to share:

A big half circle of stone, looks like a natural formation on first sight... about 100m high, 200m wide?

The strange part was, I flew right through it with the jetpack, not even at highest speed. And in the middle of it I just vanished, with a little bit of smoke. I had worse landings, don\'t know what this was.

I will try to fly through it with a spacecraft and report back.

Oh, and if I am the first to report of this Formation/Alien artifact/dimensional gate/whatever it is, i would like to name it.

For Science! 8)

What do I get if i tell you? At least you agree that I can name it, if it is important. Well... if it can make money, i\'d like to have half...

And... how to I get to see the coordinates?

Oh, and if I am the first to report of this Formation/Alien artifact/dimensional gate/whatever it is, i would like to name it.

Sorry. You\'re about 2 months too late.

And you can\'t fly/drive/walk through it. There is an invisible ion field that dematerialises anything that touches it
Congratulations! You\'ve found a Mun Arch! You can land on top, just not inside.

Yea!

What did the developers say about it? Just a joke or something behind it?
That can\'t be? Oh, I get it, it\'s a big conspiracy!
